Locale.Value:
- The document floating window can also be switched to rendering mode
- Add duplication function to whiteboard and cards
- Support counting the total word count of the entire library
- Improve the method of carriage return to jump out of paired punctuation, and better handle multiple nested paired punctuation
- Fixed the problem that the typewriter mode would flicker when changing lines in some cases
- Improved document preview rendering
- Some style adjustments and detail improvements

- 文档浮动窗口也可以切换到渲染模式
- 白板、卡片增加生成副本操作
- 支持统计整个文档库的总字数
- 改进回车跳出成对标点的方法，更好地处理多个嵌套的成对标点
- 修复打字机模式有些情况下换行时会闪烁的问题
- 改进文档预览渲染方式
- 一些样式调整及细节改进
